1.label: Numbers of clicks to control the load

4.label: Value used for devices belonging to Group 2
4.description: Value sent when the external switch receives 1 Click

5.label: Value used for devices belonging to Group 3
5.description: Value sent wen the external switch receives 2 Clicks

6.label: Value used for devices belonging to Group 4
6.description: Value sent when external switch receives 3 Clicks

10.label: Timer to switch OFF the Relay
10.description: Defines the time after which the relay is switched OFF

11.label: Timer to switch ON the Relay
11.description: Defines the time after which the relay is switched ON

15.label: Timer scale
15.description: Defines the time unit used for parameters No.10 and No.11.

20.label: One Click Scene Activation Set
20.description: Defines the Scene Activation Set value sent to the Lifeline group with 1 Click

21.label: Two Clicks Scene Activation Set
21.description: Defines the Scene Activation Set value sent to the Lifeline group with 2 Clicks

22.label: Three Clicks Scene Activation Set
22.description: Defines the Scene Activation Set value sent to the Lifeline group with 3 Clicks

60.label: Start-up Status
60.description: Defines the status of the device following a restart

62.label: Type of external switch
62.description: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device
